author: Andy Pearson
method: Place the mint and brown sugar into the bottom of a tall heatproof glass. Add the lime juice and mix (muddle) together with the end of a clean rolling pin or wooden spoon. Add the rum, then the hot water and serve.
ingredients: 20 fresh mint leaves,  2 tsp brown sugar,  20ml/¾fl oz lime juice,  50ml/1¾fl oz white rum,  200ml/7fl oz hot water
